timeline.bodyText: This test is now actually wrong, since the subscriber count should be ITEM_COUNT_UNKNOWN = -1, not 0, when the subscriber count is hidden, otherwise NewPipe wouldn't know it should hide the subscriber count
timeline.author: Stypox
TobiGr

replies.bodyText: That constant comes from ListExtractor, so it is not related to this, I was wrong when talking about it above
replies.author: Stypox

timeline.bodyText: Oh, you need to rebase. While rebasing undo this.
timeline.author: Stypox
